_meta.title: Voice Discovery Survey
_meta.description: Capture the raw inputs needed to build a Voice DNA profile

questions.label: What is your name or company name?
questions.placeholder: e.g., John Smith or Acme Corp

questions.label: What is your role or title?
What industry do you operate in?
In one sentence, what do you help people accomplish?
questions.hint: Focus on the transformation or outcome, not the method
questions.placeholder: e.g., I help small business owners automate their customer support so they can focus on growth

questions.label: What makes your approach different from others in your space?
questions.hint: Your unique perspective, methodology, or positioning
questions.placeholder: e.g., I combine enterprise rigor with startup speed...

questions.label: How formal is your communication style?
How direct are you in communication?
How technical is your default communication?
How much humor do you use in professional communication?
Which words best describe your communication style?
What phrases do you find yourself saying often?
questions.hint: List 5-10 phrases you naturally use in conversation or writing
questions.placeholder:
e.g., "Here's the thing..."
"Let's be honest..."
"Bottom line..."

questions.label: What words or phrases should we NEVER use?
questions.hint: Words that feel off-brand, inauthentic, or overused

questions.label: What pronoun style do you prefer?

options.label: First person singular (I, my, me)
options.description: Solo expert or personal brand positioning

options.label: Mixed depending on context
options.description: Flexible based on audience or content type

questions.label: What are 3-5 beliefs that shape how you approach your work?
questions.hint: Principles you'd defend, even if unpopular
questions.placeholder:
e.g., "Clarity is a form of respect"
"Most problems are decision problems, not tool problems"

questions.label: What contrarian opinions do you hold about your industry?
questions.hint: Things you believe that most people in your space would disagree with
questions.placeholder: e.g., "Most digital transformation fails because the decision is fuzzy, not because the technology is wrong"

questions.label: What communication habits annoy you?
questions.hint: Things others do in their writing or speaking that you want to avoid
questions.placeholder: e.g., vague claims, buzzword overload, hype language

questions.label: Share 1-2 pieces of your own writing you're proud of
questions.hint: Paste text samples that represent how you want to sound

questions.label: Describe or paste examples of writing styles you want to AVOID
questions.hint: What should your writing never sound like?
questions.placeholder: e.g., "Overly salesy marketing copy with lots of exclamation points!!!"

questions.label: Who is your primary reader?
questions.placeholder: e.g., VP of Engineering, Solo Founder, Marketing Director

questions.label: How sophisticated is your typical reader?

options.label: Beginner
options.description: New to the topic, needs definitions and context

options.label: Intermediate
options.description: Familiar with basics, wants practical guidance

questions.label: How skeptical is your typical reader?
